title: Shared Snippets
description: Framework-agnostic utilities that work across Express, Hono, Elysia, and any Node.js/Bun project.
installNote: Install snippets with: npx hanma add <snippet-name> --framework shared

concept.whatIsASnippet: Shared snippets are framework-agnostic utilities like database clients, mailers, and upload handlers that work in any project.
whenToUseSnippets: When you need utilities like email, file uploads, or database access
When you want to reuse code across different frameworks
When the code doesn't depend on Express/Hono/Elysia specific APIs

snippetsVsPackages.snippets: Code you own - copy, paste, modify freely
snippetsVsPackages.packages: External dependencies - updates managed by maintainers
snippetsVsPackages.benefit: Snippets give you full control and no dependency bloat
